summary: In this context, 2-ethylhexan-1-ol and n-hexanal are both mentioned as standard compounds analyzed in the study of volatile organic metabolites (VOMs) in malignant and benign effusions. However, there is no direct discussion of their relationship or interaction; they are simply part of a comparative analysis aimed at differentiating lung cancer patients from those with inflammatory conditions. Their roles as individual compounds are not elaborated upon in the context provided.
